Digital Campaign Management
• Plan, execute, and optimize digital campaigns across Facebook, Google, TikTok, LinkedIn, and other platforms.
• Manage paid ads (PPC, display ads, video ads) to achieve ROI and performance goals.
• Track daily performance and adjust strategies accordingly.Content & Social Media
• Develop and manage content calendars for social media platforms.
• Work with design and content teams to produce engaging visuals, copy, and videos.
• Monitor engagement, reach, and audience growth.SEO & Website Management
• Perform on-page and off-page SEO to improve website ranking.
• Monitor website performance and coordinate improvements with the web development team.
• Manage landing pages for campaigns.Analytics & Reporting
• Use analytics tools (Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager, etc.) to evaluate campaign performance.
• Prepare weekly and monthly performance reports.
• Provide insights and recommendations for future improvements.Brand & Marketing Strategy
• Support the development of digital marketing strategies and brand positioning.
• Maintain consistency of brand identity across all digital channels.
• Research competitors, market trends, and user behavior.
